characters: Driver of a white sedan, cyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road. The road is wet, indicating recent rain. The vehicle is following a white sedan ahead. There is a cyclist on the left side of the road in the last frame.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed, following the white sedan ahead. The vehicle is keeping a safe distance from the sedan, approximately 20 meters away. The vehicle is also aware of the cyclist on the left side, ensuring to keep a safe distance.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, maintaining a consistent speed. 2) Left: A cyclist, approximately 5 meters away, moving forward.

characters: Driver of a silver BMW, cyclist on the left side
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. Ahead, a silver BMW is stopped, and a cyclist is visible on the left side of the road. The cyclist appears to be moving towards the road, potentially causing a dangerous situation.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a close distance behind the silver BMW, possibly preparing to stop or slow down due to the cyclists movement. The vehicles speed is gradually decreasing to ensure safety.
key_objects: 1) Front: A silver BMW, approximately 2 meters away, stopped, potentially about to move forward. 2) Left side: A cyclist, approximately 5 meters away, moving towards the road, potentially causing a dangerous situation.
